Taiwan reports another suspected Chinese weather balloon crossing Taiwan StraitA suspected Chinese weather balloon flew across the sensitive Taiwan Strait on Monday but stayed well north of Taiwan, the island's defence ministry said on Tuesday, the third time this month Taipei has reported them nearby. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 01:30:02 GMT SUGQ532YDZJGLFHHHUT55YKHJA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-reports-another-suspected-chinese-weather-balloon-crossing-taiwan-strait-2023-12-19/Reuters世界亚太地区
Yen awaits critical BOJ outcome; dollar adriftThe yen rose broadly on Tuesday ahead of a policy decision from the Bank of Japan (BOJ) later in the day which some traders hope will prove crucial in determining if and when the central bank will move away from negative interest rates. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 01:27:20 GMT KZETCPARKFJYTDFUJA7RMQPJ6Y https://www.reuters.com/markets/currencies/yen-awaits-ritic-boj-outcome-dollar-adrift-2023-12-19/Rae Wee市场货币
Yen, Asian stocks in cautious mood ahead of BOJ decisionAsian shares and the yen steadied early on Tuesday as traders' focus turned on Japan's central bank and whether it might edge further away from its ultra-easy monetary policy, while global equities continued to cheer the prospect of U.S. rate cuts. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 01:11:18 GMT THPUJHCJEZPXNBQSICDYLLK5XE https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-markets-wrapup-1-2023-12-19/Tom Westbrook市场
US finds no evidence of foreign interference in 2022 midterm electionsA U.S. government report on Monday found that hackers linked to Russia and China targeted some election systems during the 2022 midterms, but found no evidence that foreign governments compromised the vote. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 23:24:00 GMT RGGIF7KIE5OPDDV5BGFL5CMAJM https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-finds-no-evidence-foreign-interference-2022-midterm-elections-2023-12-18/Reuters世界美国
Can China get its economic miracle back on track in 2024?China's disappointing post-COVID recovery has raised significant doubts about the foundations of its decades of stunning growth and presented Beijing with a tough choice for 2024 and beyond: take on more debt or grow less. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 23:05:16 GMT M5SQODLEK5LQJN4NOJV4VEIHTU https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/can-china-get-its-economic-miracle-back-track-2024-2023-12-18/Marius Zaharia市场亚洲市场
Manchin seeks to reverse Treasury exemption allowing some Chinese minerals in EVsThe chair of the Senate Energy and Natural Resources Committee wants Congress to vote on reversing the Treasury Department's electric vehicle tax credit guidance, saying it will increase U.S. reliance on China. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 21:17:08 GMT YXRMKDKKMNLC3B5GE742NLNT5A https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/manchin-wants-us-senate-vote-reverse-treasury-ev-tax-credit-guidance-2023-12-18/David Shepardson商业汽车与交通
